dim.name: nDustErosionDim
dim.description: The number of erosion layers in the gocart2G dust emission parameterization

dim.name: nCAMLevels
dim.description: The number of atmospheric levels in the first-guess CAM-Chem data set

dim.name: nBCKLevels
dim.description: The number of atmospheric levels for the monthly-mean background H2O2, OH, and NO3 fields

nml_option.name: config_CAMchem_prefix
nml_option.description: Filename prefix of the first guess CAM-Chem data set

nml_option.name: config_CAMchem_levels
nml_option.description: The number of atmospheric levels in the first guess CAM-Chem data set

nml_option.name: config_chems_bck_levels
nml_option.description: The number of atmospheric levels for the monthly-mean background H2O2, OH, and NO3 fields

nml_option.name: config_CAMS_emissions
nml_option.description: Whether to read the CAMS surface emissions file

nml_option.name: config_CAMchem_interp
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate first-guess chemical species and emissions from CAMchem input data

nml_option.name: config_gocart2G_clim
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate climatological data to run gocart2G (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_gocart2G_static
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate erod,clayfrac,and sandfrac WPS static data (case 7 only)

var.name: erod
var.description: fraction of erodible surface for use in the gocart2G chemistry

var.name: clayfrac
var.description: fraction of clay soil for use in the gocart2G chemistry

var.name: sandfrac
var.description: fraction of sand soil fraction for use in the gocart2G chemistry

var.name: bc1_em_anthro
var.description: BC1 - Black carbon hydrophobic anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: co_em_anthro
var.description: CO - Carbon monoxide anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: oc1_em_anthro
var.description: OC1 - Organic carbon hydrophobic anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: nh3_em_anthro
var.description: NH3 - Ammonia anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: so2_em_anthro
var.description: SO2 - Sulfur dioxide anthropogenic surface emission - sector All

var.name: dms_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological surface concentration of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) over oceans

var.name: oh_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological background of hydroxide (OH)

var.name: h2o2_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological background of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2)

var.name: no3_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological background of nitrate (NO3)

var.name: pres_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological background layer pressure

var.name: dpres_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological background layer thickness

var.name: background_dms
var.description: Surface concentration of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) over oceans

var.name: background_oh
var.description: Background of hydroxide (OH)

var.name: background_h2o2
var.description: Background of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2)

var.name: background_no3
var.description: Background of nitrate (NO3)

var.name: ptrop_gocart2G_clim
var.description: Monthly-mean climatological pressure at tropopause height

var.name: background_ptrop
var.description: Pressure at tropopause height

var.name: qbca1_fg
var.description: BC - first guess black carbon (accumulation carbon mode)

var.name: qbca4_fg
var.description: BC - first guess black carbon (primary carbon mode)

var.name: qpoma1_fg
var.description: POM - first guess organic carbon (accumulation carbon mode)

var.name: qpoma4_fg
var.description: POM - first guess organic carbon (primary carbon mode)

var.name: qdsta1_fg
var.description: DST - first guess dust mixing ratio (accumulation mode)

var.name: qdsta2_fg
var.description: DST - first guess dust mixing ratio (aitken mode)

var.name: qdsta3_fg
var.description: DST - first guess dust mixing ratio (coarse mode)

var.name: qncla1_fg
var.description: NCL - first guess sea-salt mixing ratio (accumulation mode)

var.name: qncla2_fg
var.description: NCL - first guess sea-salt mixing ratio (aitken mode)

var.name: qncla3_fg
var.description: NCL - first guess sea-salt mixing ratio (coarse mode)

var.name: qso4a1_fg
var.description: SO4 - first guess sulfate mixing ratio (accumulation mode)

var.name: qso4a2_fg
var.description: SO4 - first guess sulfate mixing ratio (aitken mode)

var.name: qso4a3_fg
var.description: SO4 - first guess sulfate mixing ratio (coarse mode)

var.name: numa1_fg
var.description: NUM_A1 - first guess number concentration in accumulation mode

var.name: numa2_fg
var.description: NUM_A2 - first guess number concentration in aitken mode

var.name: numa3_fg
var.description: NUM_A3 - first guess number concentration in coarse mode

var.name: qdms_fg
var.description: DMS - first guess concentration of dimethyl sulfide

var.name: qmsa_fg
var.description: MSA - first guess concentration of methanesulfonic acid

var.name: qco_fg
var.description: CO - first guess concentration of carbon monoxide

var.name: qh2o2_fg
var.description: H2O2 - first guess concentration of hydrogen peroxide

var.name: qoh_fg
var.description: OH - first guess concentration of hydroxide

var.name: qso2_fg
var.description: SO2 - first guess concentration of sulfur dioxide

var.name: qno3_fg
var.description: NO3 - first guess concentration of nitrate

var.name: dpcam_fg
var.description: First guess pressure thicknesses

var.name: pcam_fg
var.description: First guess pressure levels

var.name: qbc1
var.description: BC1 - black carbon hydrophobic mass mixing ratio

var.name: qbc2
var.description: BC2 - black carbon hydrophilic mass mixing ratio

var.name: qoc1
var.description: OC1 - organic carbon hydrophobic mass mixing ratio

var.name: qoc2
var.description: OC2 - organic carbon hydrophilic mass mixing ratio

var.name: qdust1
var.description: DUST1 - dust size bin 1 mass mixing ratio (0.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust2
var.description: DUST2 - dust size bin 2 mass mixing ratio (1.4um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust3
var.description: DUST3 - dust size bin 3 mass mixing ratio (2.4um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust4
var.description: DUST4 - dust size bin 4 mass mixing ratio (4.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qdust5
var.description: DUST5 - dust size bin 5 mass mixing ratio (8.0um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas1
var.description: SEAS1 - sea-salt size bin 1 mass mixing ratio (0.3um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas2
var.description: SEAS2 - sea-salt size bin 2 mass mixing ratio (1.0um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas3
var.description: SEAS3 - sea-salt size bin 3 mass mixing ratio (3.2um eff. radius)

var.name: qseas4
var.description: SEAS4 - sea-salt size bin 4 mass mixing ratio (7.5um eff. radius)

var.name: qsulf
var.description: SULF - sulfate mass mixing ratio

var.name: qdms
var.description: DMS - dimethyl sulfide mass mixing ratio

var.name: qmsa
var.description: MSA - methanesulfonic acid mass mixing ratio

var.name: qco
var.description: CO - carbon monoxide mass mixing ratio

var.name: qh2o2
var.description: H2O2 - hydrogen peroxide mass mixing ratio

var.name: qoh
var.description: OH - hydroxide mass mixing ratio

var.name: qso2
var.description: SO2 - sulfur dioxide mass mixing ratio

var.name: qno3
var.description: NO3 - nitrate mass mixing ratio
